inital.title: A Bridge Between Linux & Blockchain
inital.description: Build your DApp off-chain with Linux, Maitain on-chain security

news.title: NEWS
news.description: Cartesi completed it’s $1.5M token sale on Binance!

provide.title: Cartesi provides a Linux runtime environment for blockchain DApps.
provide.description: With Cartesi, developers use familiar and powerful software components supported by Linux to create their DApps. They are free from the hassle of limited domain-specific blockchain environments.

realOs.title: A Real OS. Intensive Computation.
realOs.description: Cartesi provides a Linux runtime environment for blockchain DApps. Complex computations run off-chain while retaining the strong security guarantees of the underlying blockchain.

blockchain.title: Blockchain Guaranteed Consensus.
blockchain.description: Computations can be verified by all parties involved in the App. Disputes are settled automatically by Cartesi. This requires negligible computation inside the blockchain, regardless of the size of the external computation.

development.title: Ease of Development and Portability.
development.description: Mainstream developers can fully express themselves building Apps with their familiar software stacks. Cartesi DApps are portable across the most relevant blockchains, so no need to worry about the longevity of specific projects.

defi.title: DeFi
defi.description: Cartesi applications will be able to read and do complex calculations involving data from multiple sources. This will help interoperability between blockchains and services such as future and insurance markets.

machineLearning.title: Machine Learning
machineLearning.description: A trustless marketplace for AI and computational tasks. With the power of Cartesi’s decentralized automated verification, developers will be able to create services that allow new DApps to outsource and distribute work. This opens new possibilities for lower cost AI, developed by outsourced experts and bots.

logistics.title: Logistics & Optimization
logistics.description: With Cartesi, professionals in fields such as logistics will be able to offer their services and be hired by enterprises internationally and without the need for intermediaries.

gaming.title: Gaming
gaming.description: Cartesi will unleash vast new possibilities for blockchain games. Developers will be able to use traditional tools and libraries that can be compiled for Linux. Additionally, game state processing will be free from the computational limits and high fees of blockchains without the need to sacrifice decentralization.

future.title: The Future Of Automation
future.description: “With the power of Cartesi’s decentralized verification, applications will be able to outsource and distribute verifiable work. This opens new possibilities for trustless marketplaces and autonomous systems involving humans and machines, propelling IoT, data science and AI through new business models.”

research.title: Research
research.description: Outsourced computation will allow for millions of users to lend their idle computing power. This will benefit scientific research, 3d rendering, video transcoding and many other computationally intensive tasks in a trustless way, without reputation systems.

developers.title: CARTESI DEVELOPERS
developers.subtitle: Get Early Access to Cartesi Brand New Features.
developers.description: Cartesi provides a Linux runtime environment for blockchain DApps. Complex computations run off-chain while retaining the strong security guarantees of the underlying blockchain.

partners.title: Meet the Partners and Backers that Enable Cartesi.
partners.description: Join the select group of partners and backers that are early adopting and investing in our game changing technology.

news.title: NEWS
news.description: Cartesi Partners with GoBlock on a DeFi Project

ecosystem.title: Ecosystem
ecosystem.description: Store, trade and track CTSI with our trusted partners
